languages.text: По слухам, священные карты Таро были созданы самим Императором, дабы предупредить слуг Его о грядущих опасностях. Каждая колода карт уникальна — количество карт и арканы варьируются в зависимости от региона галактики, где была создана колода. Гадание на Таро считается одним из немногих благонадежных видов гадания в Империуме.

traits.locale_text: По слухам, этот священный инструмент был создан самим Императором, дабы предупредить слуг Его о грядущих опасностях. Каждая колода карт уникальна — количество карт и арканы будут варьироваться в зависимости от региона галактики, где она была создана. Гадание на Таро считается одним из немногих благонадежных видов гадания в Империуме.

languages.text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.
languages.original_text: По слухам, священные карты Таро были созданы самим Императором, дабы предупредить слуг Его о грядущих опасностях. Каждая колода карт уникальна — количество карт и арканы варьируются в зависимости от региона галактики, где была создана колода. Гадание на Таро считается одним из немногих благонадежных видов гадания в Империуме.

traits.locale_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn his servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

languages.text: Se dice que el mismo Emperador creó las sagradas cartas del tarot para prevenir a sus sirvientes de los peligros venideros. Cada mazo de cartas es único: el número de cartas y arcanos varía en función de la región de la galaxia en la que se creó el mazo. La lectura del tarot se considera uno de los métodos de adivinación del Imperium más dignos de confianza.
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Se dice que el mismo Emperador creó las sagradas cartas del tarot para prevenir a sus sirvientes de los peligros venideros. Cada mazo de cartas es único: el número de cartas y arcanos varía en función de la región de la galaxia en la que se creó el mazo. La lectura del tarot se considera uno de los métodos de adivinación del Imperium más dignos de confianza.

languages.text: 神聖なタロット・カードは、皇帝自身が使用人たちに来るべき危険を警告するために作ったという噂がある。カードの枚数とアルカナの種類は、デッキが作られた銀河系の地域によって異なる。タロット占いは、帝国で信頼できる数少ない占いのひとつと考えられている。
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 神聖なタロット・カードは、皇帝自身が使用人たちに来るべき危険を警告するために作ったという噂がある。カードの枚数とアルカナの種類は、デッキが作られた銀河系の地域によって異なる。タロット占いは、帝国で信頼できる数少ない占いのひとつと考えられている。

languages.text: 传言声称，神圣的塔罗牌是帝皇亲自制作出来的圣物，用来警告仆人即将到来的危险。每副塔罗牌都是独一无二的，牌的数量与牌面上的预兆取决于圣牌本身所在的星域。人们普遍认为，塔罗牌占卜属于帝国之中为数不多值得信任的占卜方式之一。
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 传言声称，神圣的塔罗牌是帝皇亲自制作出来的圣物，用来警告仆人即将到来的危险。每副塔罗牌都是独一无二的，牌的数量与牌面上的预兆取决于圣牌本身所在的星域。人们普遍认为，塔罗牌占卜属于帝国之中为数不多值得信任的占卜方式之一。

languages.text: Gerüchten zufolge wurden die heiligen Tarotkarten vom Imperator selbst geschaffen, um Seine Diener vor nahenden Gefahren zu warnen. Jeder Kartenstapel ist einzigartig ... die Zahl der Karten und Arkana variiert abhängig von der Region der Galaxis, in der der Stapel geschaffen wurde. Die Deutung von Tarotkarten ist innerhalb des Imperiums eine der wenigen vertrauenswürdigen Formen der Prophetie.
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Gerüchten zufolge wurden die heiligen Tarotkarten vom Imperator selbst geschaffen, um Seine Diener vor nahenden Gefahren zu warnen. Jeder Kartenstapel ist einzigartig ... die Zahl der Karten und Arkana variiert abhängig von der Region der Galaxis, in der der Stapel geschaffen wurde. Die Deutung von Tarotkarten ist innerhalb des Imperiums eine der wenigen vertrauenswürdigen Formen der Prophetie.

languages.text: Selon la rumeur, les arcanes sacrés du tarot ont été créés par l'Empereur lui-même pour avertir Ses serviteurs des dangers à venir. Chaque jeu de cartes est unique. Le nombre de cartes et d'arcanes varie selon la région de la galaxie dans laquelle le jeu a été créé. La lecture du tarot est considérée comme l'une des rares formes de divination fiables dans l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Selon la rumeur, les arcanes sacrés du tarot ont été créés par l'Empereur lui-même pour avertir Ses serviteurs des dangers à venir. Chaque jeu de cartes est unique. Le nombre de cartes et d'arcanes varie selon la région de la galaxie dans laquelle le jeu a été créé. La lecture du tarot est considérée comme l'une des rares formes de divination fiables dans l'Imperium.

languages.text: Kutsal Tarot kartlarının, hizmetkârlarını yaklaşan tehlikelere karşı uyarmak için İmparator Hazretleri'nce yaratıldığı rivayet edilir. Her kart destesi benzersizdir. Kart sayısı ve arkana, destenin meydana getirildiği galaksi bölgesine göre değişiklik gösterir. Tarot falı, İmparatorluk'ta sayıca az olan güvenilir kehanet biçimlerinden biri olarak kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: It is rumoured that the sacred Tarot cards were created by the Emperor Himself to warn His servants of coming dangers. Each deck of cards is unique — the number of cards and arcana varies depending on the region of the galaxy where the deck was created. Tarot reading is considered one of the few trustworthy forms of divination in the Imperium.
